scripts.build:packages: pnpm prisma:generate && pnpm -C packages/spec-engine build && pnpm -C packages/mockgen build && pnpm -C packages/validator build && pnpm -C packages/orchestrator build && pnpm -C packages/connectors build && pnpm -C packages/testkit build
scripts.testkit:run: pnpm -C packages/testkit build && node packages/testkit/bin/copilot-tests.js run --suite PAYMENTS_BASELINE_v1 --base http://localhost:3000
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm --dir apps/web exec prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:migrate: pnpm --dir apps/web exec prisma migrate dev --name init
